snippet: Iraqi athletes face a special set of challenges as they attempt to represent their country in the London Games this summer.
lead_paragraph: Iraqi athletes face a special set of challenges as they attempt to represent their country in the London Games this summer.

headline.seo: Challenges for Iraq’s Olympic Hopefuls Go Beyond Time and Space
headline.main: Challenges for Iraqi Athletes Go Beyond Space and Time
headline.print_headline: Challenges for Iraqi Athletes Go Beyond Space and Time
